title: Male motorcyclist killed in Etobicoke crash: police - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
content:
One motorcyclist is dead following a collision in Etobicoke late Saturday night.
It happened near Lake Shore Boulevard West and Forty Second Street at around 10:15 p.m.

author: Canadian Press
description: TORONTO — Ontario is reporting 744 new cases of COVID-19 and 24 more deaths linked to the virus today. Health Minister Christine Elliott says there are 181 new cases in Toronto, 123 in Peel Region, 31 in Durham Region and 51 in the Waterloo region.
title: Ontario reports 744 new cases of COVID-19, 24 deaths, nearly 173000 vaccinations - The Record (New Westminster)
content:
